alert.note: Alert for Leake; Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 22 at 12:46PM CDT until March 22 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Western Leake County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1246 PM CDT, tornado producing storms were located along a line extending from near Way to near Gluckstadt, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * These tornadic storms will be near... Way around 1250 PM CDT. Sharon and Cameron around 100 PM CDT. Farmhaven and Camden around 105 PM CDT. Thomastown around 115 PM CDT. Carthage and Singleton around 125 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these tornadic storms include Redwater. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
